comments.creator: mary@mozilla.com
comments.author: mary@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Hi there:  I'd like to get the brand survey question added to the first run page for the es-es, pt-br and es-ar builds.  We're kicking off the De Todos.  Para Todos campaign shortly (mid-nov).  I'd like to get a baseline before the campaign goes into full swing.

I'd like to ask Jayson to help with the pt-br strings, Guillermo the es-ar strings and nukeador (or whomever else is a good fit) to handle the es-es.  We'll need to translate and regionalize a bit.

Laura:  Can you help provide the strings and any other info we need to make this happen?  Thanks!
comments.raw_text:
Hi there:  I'd like to get the brand survey question added to the first run page for the es-es, pt-br and es-ar builds.  We're kicking off the De Todos.  Para Todos campaign shortly (mid-nov).  I'd like to get a baseline before the campaign goes into full swing.

I'd like to ask Jayson to help with the pt-br strings, Guillermo the es-ar strings and nukeador (or whomever else is a good fit) to handle the es-es.  We'll need to translate and regionalize a bit.

Laura:  Can you help provide the strings and any other info we need to make this happen?  Thanks!

Hi All,
Just to confirm, this is the only brand survey question:
"Did you know that Firefox is developed by a non-profit organization?"
comments.text:
Hi All,
Just to confirm, this is the only brand survey question:
"Did you know that Firefox is developed by a non-profit organization?"
comments.author: jesse@nobox.com
comments.creator: jesse@nobox.com

comments.author: jesse@nobox.com
comments.text:
Hi Mary, here they are. Let me know if you have any questions. 

pt-br
Você sabia que o Firefox é desenvolvido por uma organização sem fins lucrativos?

es-ar
¿Sabías que Firefox es desarrollado por una organización sin fines de lucro?

es-es
¿Sabías que Firefox es desarrollado por una organización sin ánimo de lucro?
comments.creator: jesse@nobox.com
comments.raw_text:
Hi Mary, here they are. Let me know if you have any questions. 

pt-br
Você sabia que o Firefox é desenvolvido por uma organização sem fins lucrativos?

es-ar
¿Sabías que Firefox es desarrollado por una organización sin fines de lucro?

es-es
¿Sabías que Firefox es desarrollado por una organización sin ánimo de lucro?

comments.text:
I would change es-ES a bit:

¿Sabías que Firefox está desarrollado por una organización sin ánimo de lucro?

The verb "estar" sound better for be than "ser". I don't know if this also applies to es-AR. 

Why not including es-CL and es-MX locales?
comments.author: nukeador@protonmail.com
comments.creator: nukeador@protonmail.com
comments.raw_text:
I would change es-ES a bit:

¿Sabías que Firefox está desarrollado por una organización sin ánimo de lucro?

The verb "estar" sound better for be than "ser". I don't know if this also applies to es-AR. 

Why not including es-CL and es-MX locales?

comments.author: mary@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Thanks, Nukeador.  I didn't include es-CL and es-MX since I was focused on getting the brand awareness survey in the locales where the concerted brand efforts are taking place.

I added es-es as most folks in AR use it and that you're working on the Delightment project for ES.

I have no idea how much time it takes to get this implemented :)  If it's easy, let's add the other locales.  If not, I want to focus on the three languages and get it going as soon as possible.

Thanks!
comments.creator: mary@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
Thanks, Nukeador.  I didn't include es-CL and es-MX since I was focused on getting the brand awareness survey in the locales where the concerted brand efforts are taking place.

I added es-es as most folks in AR use it and that you're working on the Delightment project for ES.

I have no idea how much time it takes to get this implemented :)  If it's easy, let's add the other locales.  If not, I want to focus on the three languages and get it going as soon as possible.

Thanks!

comments.author: jesse@nobox.com
comments.text:
Hey Nukeador & co.,
We were using the verb "ser" to imply that Firefox is actively in the present tense and in an ongoing manner developing Firefox. But we can go with either.
comments.creator: jesse@nobox.com
comments.raw_text:
Hey Nukeador & co.,
We were using the verb "ser" to imply that Firefox is actively in the present tense and in an ongoing manner developing Firefox. But we can go with either.

Hi all! 

I would translate the sentence differently; I would say "¿Sabes que Firefox lo desarrolla una organización sin ánimo de lucro?". In my opinion, this sounds like more natural in Spanish, but if I had to choose between "ser" or "estar", in this case I would choose the latter, "estar".
comments.text:
Hi all! 

I would translate the sentence differently; I would say "¿Sabes que Firefox lo desarrolla una organización sin ánimo de lucro?". In my opinion, this sounds like more natural in Spanish, but if I had to choose between "ser" or "estar", in this case I would choose the latter, "estar".

comments.text: I have to agree with Inma, who is our linguistic expert ;)

I agree with Inma that: "¿Sabés que Firefox lo desarrolla una organización sin fines de lucro?" sounds better (this is an es-AR version of her option)

comments.raw_text:
Here's some more info that will help you guys implement this. 

For en-US we created the copy in Bug 672674 and all the deployment details (code,etc) can be traced in Bug 660996. We're currently running this only on the /download/product page (the "Thank you for downloading" page you see after downloading) so I recommend doing the same so we can compare our findings across locales. 

As for the survey - Mary, perhaps you can create the survey in SurveyGizmo simply by replicating the one I used. Use one survey/locale. 

Hope this helps!
comments.creator: lforrest@mozilla.com
comments.author: lforrest@mozilla.com

Hey Laura:  I realized I'm letting this slip a bit and hoping I can get someone from the LATAM team to help.  Did you create the es one? http://appv3.sgizmo.com/projects/editor?id=707370

In terms of deploying it, do we file a site bug?  Is there any copy we need for the the actual page?

Thanks!

To help out here, I've filed the es-ES survey in bug 700156. Let's limit the scope of this bug to pt-br and es-ar. 

Yes - more copy is needed and 2 WebDev implementation bugs are needed to deploy these last two locales. I'll file those. I've filed es-ES in bug 700156.

For those, we need slightly more content translated. Can someone help out on that? See this etherpad for the little that's left:
https://etherpad.mozilla.org/brand-survey-translations

At that point we'll be ready to deploy.
comments.creator: lforrest@mozilla.com

comments.creator: jesse@nobox.com
lforrest@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Thanks for the translations! All surveys are ready to go. Please see the individual bugs for details. Any survey tweaks can be made by anyone with access to SurveyGizmo. 

Mary and others - Please check these individual bugs and make sure that we've correctly matched the language to the locale via Comment 13 and update the individual bugs if changes are needed. For every new locale we apply this to we will need to create a new survey/bug so survey answers can be separated out. 

Bugs:
es-ES Bug 700156 
es-AR Bug 702436
pt-BR Bug 702434

Overall tracking bug:
Bug 700160 - see comments for the latest implementation details
comments.author: lforrest@mozilla.com
